project.name: C-C400B-FFMP-07-ST02-DT02-DF05-CF24-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a filename to read in the file contents using an fread operation within the function Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C400B-FFMP-07-ST02-DT02-DF05-CF24-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Runs a bunch of hashing algorithms on a files contents. If a file doesn't end, ex: '/dev/urandom', will fork and consume a lot of cpu on different cpus

scoring_formula.formula: ((GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT) AND log_file_hashes_7YNtLyFDr1

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep -E '^[0-9a-f]{32,128} .+' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) % 21 )); then false; else true; fi;

iopair.name: C-C400B-FFMP-07-ST02-DT02-DF05-CF24-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Runs a bunch of hashing algorithms on a files contents. If a file doesn't end, ex: '/dev/urandom', will fork and consume a lot of cpu on different cpus

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_RWN4CIjg0RMyzSbUSjUJ AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_BHKncbqSx1)) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_BHKncbqSx1))))
